name: Neelanshu Karn
bio: President, SAST | Tech Leader | Clan Leader | Innovating at the Intersection of Space and Technology. As the President of the Society for Astrophysics and Space Technology (SAST) and a Clan Leader at Rishihood University, I lead diverse teams of innovators driven by curiosity and purpose. Passionate about bridging space exploration with emerging technologies — from building satellite prototypes to fostering tech-driven research and learning. With a background in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence, I focus on turning ideas into impact, empowering students to explore, create, and lead through innovation.

name: Debashis Pani
bio: I'm Debashis Pani, a backend-focused full-stack developer passionate about building scalable and meaningful software systems. I'm currently pursuing a B.Tech in Information Technology at KIIT, graduating in 2026, and have gained hands-on experience through impactful internships and national-level hackathons. My core skills include Node.js, Express.js, React, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, with deployment experience using Docker, GitHub Actions, Nginx, and AWS EC2.
